annotation: Day (not night), day (period of time) (Fbg),  Green 71 notes this is a loan from Tikopia
list originally had siang but that word usually refers to 'early afternoon, clearest part of the day'

language: East Sumbanese, Umbu Ratu Nggai dialect

annotation: a lapse of days (period of time)

language: Kadazan Dusun of Taginambur, Kota Belud, Sabah, Malaysia
